description:
Black shoes and a black suit work great if you’re going to a funeral, but most of the time we’re a little more colorful in our wardrobes.黑皮鞋和黑西装配极了——假如你要去参加葬礼的话。但多数时间里我们衣柜里会有更多种色彩。

How does a man wearing a navy, light-grey, or brown suit match his shoes with the suit color?如果男士穿着海军蓝、浅灰色或是棕色的西装，那么同样颜色的鞋子会和衣服相配吗？

Take a moment to get to know the chart below.花时间看看下面这张图片吧。

It pairs the five most common suit colors — navy, medium or mid-gray,charcoal, brown, and black — with three different shoes to show you which colors work with which leathers.上面有最常见的几种西装颜色——海军蓝、中灰色、炭黑色、棕色和黑色——以及三种不同的鞋子，从中你能知道哪种颜色的西服和哪种皮鞋相配。

Now, are these shoe matching rules absolute? Not entirely — but it’s a very safe guide to follow.那么，这种配对是绝对的吗？不一定——不过是一种非常安全的指导。

If you’re bucking the advice here, it should be because you’re going for a really unique look or you know the rules and make a conscious decision to ignore them!如果你没有遵从这些建议，或许是因为你想要看起来特立独行或者你明知道这个规则，然后主观作出决定无视它们！

For example, we don’t have the burgundy shoes paired with a black suit. But a rocker might wear a black suit with red Converse All-Stars. 比如，酒红色的鞋子不可能和黑色的西装一起穿，但一位摇滚歌手却有可能穿一件黑色的西装和红色的匡威全明星鞋子。

There are going to be exceptions.不过凡事总有例外。

But there aren’t many of them, and if you’re sticking to classic business and business-casual dress, let this chart be your guide.但是例外不多，假如你总是穿经典的商务或是商务休闲服装，就参考这张表来穿吧。

Most of the time it’s not too hard. Strict business formality is easy — a charcoal gray or navy blue suit and plain black shoes.大部分情况下这都不难。严肃的商务风格很容易——炭灰色或是海军蓝的西装配上浅白色鞋子。

But as the suits (and the business climate) become more relaxed, you get the option of wearing different colors of leather with them. That’s a stumblingblock for a lot of men — and the wrong color of shoes and belt can ruin even a fine suit.不过随着衣服（以及商务环境）变得越来越休闲，你会有机会选择搭配不同的颜色的皮鞋。对大部分男人来说这都是件令人头疼的事儿——而且穿错了颜色的鞋子和皮带很可能毁掉一件很好的衣服。

Here’s how most of these combinations play out in practical, day-to-day dress:以下是这几种组合在现实的日常穿着中是怎么搭配起来的：

1. Navy Blue Suits1.海军蓝西装

Pair with:搭配：

Black shoes
Brown shoes
Red or burgundy shoes黑色鞋
棕色鞋
红色或酒红色鞋

Navy can go comfortably with all three of the main color families of men’s leather shoes. You can probably even make a navy suit work with moreexotic colors if you have them, although blue is generally too close to make a good contrast.海军蓝和所有这三种主要的男士皮鞋色系搭配起来都比较适宜。你甚至还能让海军蓝的西装和一些更有异域风情的颜色搭配，虽然蓝色一般来说容易和其他颜色产生巨大的色差。

The leather color mostly affects the formality and attitude of a navy suit. Black shoes are business dress, while brown are more relaxed, and red or burgundy give it the most playful, social feel.皮鞋的颜色会最大程度上影响到海军蓝西装的正式程度。商务装穿黑色，休闲装穿棕色，而红色和酒红色则会让人感觉更随意，更具社交性。

2. Medium and Light Grey Suits2.中度灰或是浅灰色西装

Pair with:搭配：

Black shoes
Brown shoes
Red or burgundy shoes黑色鞋
棕色鞋
红色或酒红色鞋

Medium gray suits are less formal than navy suits, and share a similar flexibility. You can pair them effectively with just about any color of leather.比起海军蓝色的西装，中灰色的西装显得不那么正式，并且也有同样的弹性。它们能和几乎所有颜色的皮鞋相配。

In the case of medium gray, black is the best option when you’re wearing a white shirt and a necktie. It’s still not proper business dress (the suit itself is too light), but it’s quite typical in offices where suits are mandatory but somewhat relaxed. Brown and burgundy shoes make it more of a casual/social look, and work best when the shirt has a bit of pattern or color to it as well.就中灰色而言，当你穿着白色的衬衫和领带时黑色就是最好的选择。这也不是合适的商务着装（西装本身就太浅了），但是在那些必须穿西装但可以相对休闲的办公室里这样的打扮却非常典型。灰色和酒红色的鞋子会使它显得更休闲更社交，而当你穿的衬衫也有点这种风格的话就最完美了。

3. Brown Suits3.棕色西装

Pair with:搭配：

Brown shoes
Red or burgundy shoes棕色鞋
红色或酒红色鞋

Do not pair with:
Black shoes不要搭配：
黑色鞋

Brown’s great with most casual leather shoes. It’s generally better to have the shoe leather darker than the suit (helps keep the eye from being drawn downward), but either way can work so long as you have a clear contrast.棕色和大多数休闲皮鞋都能很好地相配。一般来说鞋子的颜色最好比西服的颜色更深一点（这样可以防止眼睛往下面落），不过只要能有清楚的对比，两种方式都可以起作用。

4. Charcoal Grey Suits4.炭灰色西装

Pair with:搭配：

Black shoes
Burgundy shoes黑色鞋
酒红色鞋

Do not pair with:
Brown shoes不要搭配：
棕色鞋

Here’s where we get to our first firm “no” on the list: don’t pair charcoal suits with brown shoes.在这里我们看到了列表中第一个“不要”：不要把炭灰色西装和棕色的鞋子配在一起。

Dark browns look like you’re trying for a close match and coming up short. Light browns are too informal, and draw the eye jarringly downward. Plain black works best, or a deep burgundy for a look that’s relaxed but still elegant.深棕色会让你显得就像穿着短裤去参加婚礼一样。而浅棕色又太不正式了，也会让眼睛往下面瞟。纯黑色是最好的搭配，或者是深酒红色，看起来休闲而又优雅。

5. Black Suits5.黑色西装

Pair with:搭配：

Black shoes黑色鞋

Do not pair with:Brown shoes
Burgundy shoes不要搭配：棕色鞋酒
红色鞋

Black’s not very flexible. That’s why we generally recommend charcoal gray or navy blue in its place as a first suit. If you own one, pair it with black shoes, and save the outfit for funerals and strict business dress occasions.黑色并没有多大的弹性。这也是为什么我们一般会推荐穿炭灰色或是海军蓝色。如果你有一件黑色的西装，就搭配一双黑色的鞋子吧。然后把这套衣服留给葬礼或是严肃的商务着装场合。

Any other color of shoe is going to look too casual with black.其他颜色的鞋子和黑色配在一起会显得太随意。

西装一族必学：炎炎夏日如何穿正装？

人靠衣装是真的：穿对衣服能提高影响力

title: 男士必学：不同颜色西装怎么配皮鞋

description:
《速度与激情5》在2011年打出了一套“还我漂漂拳”，令如我之辈不少人误以为那才是《速度与激情》系列的该有的面目，没想到两年后的《速度与激情6》又让我经历了一场“激情与速冻”——，坐在巨幕前，被点燃的激情与期许遭遇铺面而来的液氮袭击，嘎嘣嘎嘣，心碎了一地。

《速度与激情》是典型的激素电影。不过激素电影有两种，一种令人不知不觉中长膘，另一种会突然刺激肾上腺分泌。从创作图谋来讲，《速度与激情》一直试图令市场兴奋，但又不得法门，连拍四部都不温不火，淤积了一身膘肉。直到第五部激战里约热内卢，突然小宇宙爆发，卷起了6.5亿美金的票房，其中咱国人贡献2.5亿人民币。

当然，第五部的成功不无之前两部的铺垫之功。该片在第三部找到华裔导演林谐彬时，这小子还一度因其老拿亚洲人开涮而相拒。后来他干脆把第三部移师东京，亚洲形象在影片中也大为改观。当初林谐彬对飙车并不在行，第三部也就算是练练手，到第四部开始发力，票房也翻了一番。到了第五部，林谐彬在视效和剧情上双管齐下，终于将此系列推向了全所未有的高潮。

《速度与激情6》中文版预告片：

《速度与激情6》故事时序承接第五部，剧情跳转与第四部莱蒂之死紧扣。警方的几张照片宣告莱蒂满血复活，并以此当诱饵垂钓多米尼出手。在这一集中，多米尼和《中国好声音》的阿妹如出一辙，均主打Family牌，故一众Family成员奋不顾身为解救莱蒂而去。当然，这不过是个诱因。而真正的主菜是，导演需要这个无所不能的飞车党去对付另一个邪恶的飞车党。

《速度与激情6》一出发，首先就从剧情设置上开始溃败。大BOSS冲着价值十亿美元的芯片而去，警方是知情的，这时候不靠汤姆克鲁斯和007，将希望倾注在一帮飞车党毛贼上，显然是杀牛用了宰鸡刀；敌方仅靠改装F1赛车就能轻松摆脱截击，连伦敦警方的电子眼都成了盲眼，结果多米尼却能在地下赛车场轻松邂逅失忆的莱蒂；而号称只有他想见你时才现身的大BOSS，与多米尼对话后的告别来得那么简易，多米尼的狙击手将对方狙击手直接干掉，再赤手将其拿下不就抱得美人归了，何须后边又是坦克又是飞机的。

从第三部赛车还债，到第四部价值140万美金的石油罐装车，再到第五部1亿美金的劫案，再再到如今价值十亿的芯片争夺，多米尼和他的Family越玩越大；而从东京街头狂飙，到多米尼加的油罐车狂飙，再到里约热内卢的火车和集装箱狂飙，再再到如今的坦克和飞机狂飙，林谐彬的手法也越玩越大。我们不敢奢求好莱坞视效大片有何过人剧情，但至少得有一个顺溜的故事。《速度与激情5》的大成，在于它的剧情、动作设计和里约风光巧妙一体，可怜的《速度与激情6》却停留在了难以自圆其说的层面，而场面和火药终究是无法欲盖弥彰。

title: 《速度与激情6》影评：被速冻的激情

description:
When "The Big Bang Theory" returns for Season 7 this September, it will have a larger premiere than originally anticipated.今年9月回归的《生活大爆炸》第七季首播集将会比前几季都来得更长些。

CBS announced on Monday (July 29) that its hit comedy will expand to one hour during its premiere on Thursday, Sept. 26, airing two original episodes back-to-back at 8 p.m. The move seems designed to provide as strong a lead-in as possible to Robin Williams' comeback comedy "The Crazy Ones" when it premieres at 9 p.m.CBS电视网周一宣布，该台情景喜剧《生活大爆炸》9月26日播出的第七季首播集将会是两集联播，时长将会有1小时，因此开播时间改为晚八点。这个安排似乎是想为排在《生活大爆炸》之后9点播出的Robin Williams的新剧《The Crazy Ones》首播营造一个最佳观众导入效果。

Of course, by adding the additional half-hour of "TBBT," the series premiere of "The Millers" -- Will Arnett's new comedy -- finds itself pushed back a week, now set to premiere on Oct. 3 at 8:30 p.m.当然也因为《生活大爆炸》播出时间加长，原来这个时段播出的新剧《The Millers》首播时间将会推迟一个星期，档期排在了10月3号的8点30。

title: 《生活大爆炸》第7季回归两集联播

description:
对华语歌曲已觉乏味？想开辟新大陆？朋友们一起出去唱歌，想露一手但又觉得英文歌曲大都无从下手？在【听歌学英语】系列，小编会给大家推荐一些简单易学的英文歌曲，让你瞬间成为麦霸！

沪江英乐：这期带来的是令人激情澎湃的摇滚音乐《It's My Life》，由上世纪80年代当代美国摇滚歌手Bon Jovi演唱。如果说你是一位反恐精英CS游戏的爱好者，相信对这首歌一定不会特别陌生。最早由德国的CS玩家在制作游戏视频时用到了此音乐，后来随着视频的流传，这首歌就和CS紧密地结合在了一起。这首歌虽然属于摇滚音乐，但是歌词速度并不是特别快，所以上手并不困难。反复练习几遍便可以在与朋友出去唱歌时大秀一把了。

【Bon Jovi-It's My Life】

中英歌词：

This isn't a song for the broken-hearted
No silent prayer for the faith-departed
I ain't gonna be just a face in the crowd
You're gonna hear my voice
When I shout it out loud这不是一首给伤心人的歌
上帝不会庇护那些没有信仰的祈祷者
我不希望自己只是芸芸众生之一
你将会听到我的心声
当我大声喊出来

It's my life
It's now or never
I ain't gonna live forever
I just wanna live while I'm alive
(It's my life)
My heart is like an open highway
Like Frankie said
I did it my way
I just wanna live while I'm alive
It's my life这就是我的人生
把握现在，机会稍纵即逝
我不祈望能够长生不老
我只想每天都能活的精彩
（这就是我的人生）
我的心就像奔驰在开阔的大道上
正像弗兰克所唱的
每个人都要活出自己的精彩
我只想每天都能活的精彩
这就是我的人生

This is for the ones who stood their ground
For Tommy and Gina who never backed down
Tomorrow's getting harder make no mistake
Luck ain't even lucky
Got to make your own brakes
bettter stand tall when they're calling you out
Don't bend,don't brake,baby,don't back down这首歌是送给那些坚定信念的人
送给从未退缩的Tommy和Gina
未来更艰辛，容不下任何错误
幸运女神不会一再的眷顾
成功只能靠自己
无论面对什么困恼都要挺直身子
别屈服，别放弃，别退缩

It's my life
And it's now or never
I ain't gonna live forever
I just wanna live while I'm alive
(It's my life)
My heart is like an open highway
Like Frankie said
I did it my way
I just wanna live while I'm alive
'Cause it's my life这就是我的人生
把握现在，机会稍纵即逝
我不祈望能够长生不老
我只想每天都能活的精彩
（这是我的人生）
我的心就像奔驰在开阔的大道上
正像弗兰克所唱的
每个人都要活出自己的精彩
我只想每天都能活的精彩
因为这就是我的人生
这就是我的人生

Better stand tall when they're calling you out
Don't bend, don't break, baby, don't back down
It's my life
And it's now or never
'Cause I ain't gonna live forever
I just wanna live while I'm alive
(It's my life)
My heart is like an open highway
Like Frankie said
I did it my way
I just wanna live while I'm alive
It's my life无论面对什么困恼都要挺直身子
别屈服，别放弃，别退缩
这就是我的人生
把握现在，机会稍纵即逝
我不祈望能够长生不老
我只想每天都能活的精彩
(这是我的人生)
我的心就像奔驰在开阔的大道上
正像弗兰克所唱的
每个人都要活出自己的精彩
我只想每天都能活的精彩

And it's now or never
'Cause I ain't gonna live forever
I just wanna live while I'm alive
(It's my life)
My heart is like an open highway
Like Frankie said
I did it my way
I just wanna live while I'm alive
'Cause it's my life!把握现在，机会稍纵即逝
我不祈望能够长生不老
我只想每天都能活的精彩
这就是我的人生
我的心就像奔驰在开阔的大道上
就像弗兰克所唱的
每个人都要活出自己的精彩
我只想每天都能活的精彩
因为这就是我的人生

学单词：

1. Don't bend.
bend: v. 挽，使弯曲；在歌词里这里是屈服的意思。
eg:None of the suitors could bend the bow of odysseus.没有一个求婚者能拉动奥得修斯的弓。

2. Don't brake.
brake: v.刹车
eg: The Government is determined to put a brake on public spending.政府决定遏制公共事务的开支.
 

学短语：

1. For Tommy and Gina who never backed down.
back down: 放弃,撤诉,食言,打退堂鼓
eg: They come to a house whose back walls have completely broken down . 他们来到了一座后塘已完全倒塌的房子。

2. Bettter stand tall when they're calling you out.
call out: 出动,唤起,大声叫唤
eg: Miners were called out (on strike) by union leaders. 矿工遵照工会领袖的指示举行罢工.

title: 听歌学英语：Bon Jovi - It's My life

description:
每天背10句，你能坚持多久？

1. There’re plenty more fish in the sea. 天涯何处无芳草。

2. My enthusiasm was renewed. 我又重新燃起热情。

3. Isn’t it a little bourgeois? 是不是有点太庸俗了？

4. She’s very limber. 她身材很柔软。

5. I won’t knuckle under. 我不会屈服。►knuckle under 屈服，认输，承认失败
e.g. He refused to knuckle under to the enemy. 他拒绝向敌人投降。

6. She’s no raving beauty. 她并非大美女。►raving 作形容词时，有“无伦次的、胡说八道的、狂乱的”的意思；在口语中也常用来表达“令人心醉的、迷人的、卓越的”之意。

7. It’ll be curtains for me. 我就没戏唱了。

8. From a lay perspective, it’s almost incomprehensible. 外行根本无法理解。►from a lay perspective 从世俗的观点来看，从一个外行的观点来看
lay 作形容词时，有“世俗的、外行的”的意思

9. Queen Anne is dead. 你才知道啊。►这句话通常指，已经不是新闻了，早知道了，消息已经过时了。很实用的一个句子。

10. My concentration began to waver. 我精力有点不集中了。

（句子解析由沪江小编提供，转载请注明出处）

title: 魔鬼口语1000句（六十九）：重燃热情

description:
Former smokers earn higher wages than smokers and people who have never smoked, according to new research.一项新的研究发现，成功戒烟者的工资水平要高于未戒烟者和从未吸过烟的人。

In a working paper published by the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta, research economists Julie L. Hotchkiss and M. Melinda Pitts studied the relationship between smoking and wages. Using data from the Tobacco Use Supplement to the U.S. Census Bureau's Current Population Survey over the period of 1992 to 2011, the economists found that people who had quit smoking for at least a year earned higher wages than smokers and people who had never smoked. The data shows that nonsmokers, which include never smokers and former smokers, bring in about 95% of the hourly wages of former smokers.在亚特兰大联邦储备银行公布的一份工作论文当中，霍奇基斯和皮茨这两名经济学家对吸烟与工资之间的关系进行了研究。利用从1992年到2011年间美国人口普查局当期人口调查中的《烟草制品使用情况附录》数据，两人发现，成功戒烟至少一年的人群，其工资高于未戒烟者和从未吸过烟的人。数据表明，不吸烟人群（包括从不吸烟的人群和已经戒烟的人群）的每小时工资水平大致相当于已戒烟者的95%。

Smokers, on the other hand, are not rewarded as much in the workplace. They earned about 80% of nonsmokers' wages. Even one cigarette a day triggers a wage gap between smokers and nonsmokers, the economists write. 'Smoking erodes the value of your human capital in the labor market,' said Ms. Pitts.而另一方面，职场中未戒烟者的情况要更差一些。两名经济学家写道，他们的工资水平相当于不吸烟人群的80%。皮茨说，吸烟会侵蚀你在劳动力市场上的人力资源价值。

Are tobacco users earning less because smoking reduces their productivity? Ms. Hotckiss and Ms. Pitts didn't find evidence for this. The two economists tested the relationship between wages and smoking intensity and found that the frequency at which people smoke doesn't significantly affect their earnings. 'The idea is that if the productivity was affected by smoking, then heavier smokers would have a much larger wage gap. We didn't find support for this hypothesis,' said Ms. Pitts.未戒烟者的工资水平较低是不是因为吸烟降低了他们的劳动生产率呢？霍奇基斯和皮茨并没有发现相关证据。这两名经济学家测试了工资和吸烟强度的关系，发现吸烟的频度对他们的收入没有显著影响。皮茨说，这里面的逻辑是，如果说吸烟影响生产率，那么吸烟频率高的人的工资差距就应该大一些，不过我们并没有发现支持这一假设的证据。

They determined that differences in the characteristics of smokers and nonsmokers, such as educational attainment, as well as unmeasured factors such as an employer's tolerance to smoking behavior, are mostly driving the wage gap. They noted that education level was the largest contributing variable. Nonsmokers tend to be more educated, are less likely to have spouses who smoke and live in states where cigarette prices are higher than smokers.他们认为，未戒烟人群和不吸烟人群之间出现的工资水平差距大部分原因在于特质上的差别（比如受教育程度）和其他未测量的因素（比如雇主对抽烟这种行为的容忍度）。他们指出，受教育程度是影响最大的变量。与未戒烟人群相比，不吸烟人群的受教育程度更高，其配偶吸烟的可能性也更低，并且居住在香烟价格水平更高的州里面。

The findings suggest that the characteristics of former smokers are more highly rewarded in the labor market than those of smokers and people who have never smoked. 'It takes a special person to quit an addictive behavior, and there is a higher reward for smoking cessation than not ever starting it,' said Ms. Pitts. 'I think the qualities of persistence, patience and everything else that goes along with being able to quit are valuable to employers.'相关发现表明，与未戒烟者和从未吸过烟的人相比，戒烟者的特质在劳动市场中更被看重。皮茨说：只有比较特别的人才能戒掉一种成瘾行为，因此，与从未开始吸烟这种行为相比，戒烟这种行为得到的奖励更高；我认为，对雇主而言，坚持、耐心和其他与戒烟能力相关的所有品质都很有价值。

沪江小编健康提醒：吸烟有害健康。咱可不要为了工资多而去吸烟，这是拣了芝麻丢了西瓜的做法。身体健康才是本钱！
